overview:
Greg is the global senior vice president of marketing and product management at Sourcefire, Inc., network security intrusion prevention system provider.

Previously Greg was CEO of DisplayPoints, Inc. a digital media company, acquired September 2009. Prior leadership as vice president channels, field marketing, and global marketing for TippingPoint Technologies, acquired January 2005. Stayed on as vice president of marketing for TippingPoint, division of 3Com. Earlier was vice president of marketing for Traq Wireless, leading wireless management vendor; director of solutions marketing for BMC Software; director of business development at PDQ.net ISP, acquired 1998.
